name: Talking Tom Cake Jump
description:
Talking Tom and Friends are making the tallest cake in the world, and they need your help.

Tap the screen to make Talking Tom jump as more and more cake layers are added to the cake. Can you make a cake that reaches all the way up to the sun?

Earn coins as you play and spend them on power ups, new worlds, new characters and new costumes. Play as Tom and his friends Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben and Talking Ginger. With your help, they can make the biggest, tastiest cake ever!

Talking Tom Cake Jump is currently only available in English.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- The option to make in-app purchases
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money
